Event.name: Container_focused_placing
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> affects a <fen>Goal</fen> location by moving a <fen>Theme</fen>, but without necessarily filling or covering it.
This frame is for Inheritance purposes.</def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the actor who instigates the filling.</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> is the physical object or substance which changes location. <ex><fex name="Agent">Rev. Lovejoy</fex> <fex name="Manner">carefully</fex> <t>brushed</t> <fex name="Goal">the rolls</fex> <fex name="Theme">with butter</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Source</fen> is the location where the <fen>Theme</fen> begins its motion. <ex><fex name="Agent">Josef</fex> <t>filled</t> <fex name="Goal">his flask</fex> <fex name="Source">from the whiskey bottle</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Path
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Path</fen> is the trajectory of the motion. <ex><fex name="Agent">Jess</fex> <t>filled</t> <fex name="Goal">the container</fex> <fex name="Path">through a small hole in the lid</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Goal
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Goal</fen> is the area or container being filled. Goal is generally the NP Object in this frame.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>Depictive phrase describing the <fen>Agent</fen> of the filling action. <ex><fex name="Dep">Naked</fex>, <fex name="Agent">Margeret</fex> <t>filled</t> <fex name="Goal">the tub</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Result</fen> is the resultant state after the filling has occurred.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="Explanation">Explanation</fex> for which the <fen>Agent</fen> fills or covers the <fen>Goal</fen>. <ex><fex name="Agent">Samantha</fex> <t>covered</t> <fex name="Goal">the table</fex> <fex name="Theme">with flowers</fex> <fex name="Explanation">because she was bored</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Agent</fen> fills the <fen>Goal</fen>. <ex><fex name="Agent">Samantha</fex> <t>covered</t> <fex name="Goal">the table</fex> <fex name="Theme">with flowers</fex> <fex name="Purpose">to please her mother</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Subregion
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Subregion</fen> is the smaller area of the <fen>Goal</fen> where the filling or covering occurs. <ex><fex name="Agent">Mrs. Bouvier</fex> <t>anointed</t> <fex name="Goal">the children</fex> <fex name="Theme">with oil</fex> <fex name="Subregion">on the forehead</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Cause
Arg.definition: <def-root>An event which brings about the filling of the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>
